# Uniform random numbers 15p


```{python}
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd


X = np.random.uniform(-1,1,1000)

X = pd.DataFrame(X)

X.plot.hist()






```
\newpage


# Normal random numbers 16p


```{python}
X = np.random.normal(3,2,1000)
X = pd.DataFrame(X)
X.plot.hist()


```

# Exponential random numbers 17p

```{python}
X = np.random.exponential(1/5,size=10000)

X = pd.DataFrame(X)
X.plot.hist()


```

# Poisson random numbers 18p
```{python}
x=np.random.poisson(5, size=10000)
X  = pd.DataFrame(X)
X.plot.hist()

```
